title: Multiple issues continue. And a new one.
comment: 7/19 update:new: when you open the stock texting app, the tts+ controls pop up over the screen and you can't back out. Old: book still doesn't keep up with the pages if you stop the tts before reopening the book. Unless you completely shut off the app in the task manager, the tts won't restart even if you go into the reader app. Lastly, it doesn't start when you plug in the headset consistently-and usually when you have resigned yourself to the fact that it's not going to work and don't expect it at all.
Excellent
Students. Download now and take this advantage.
Good Stuff
This made my life so much easier. Thank you!! Keep working out those bugs.

title: A big step backwards in usability.
comment: Latest updates no longer integrated well with FBR. When FBR is sent to the background and recalled, the highlighted spoken text remains but the play controls of the plug-in disappeared. When long press the home button to bring back the plug-in,  the control appears but no FBR display! Only by stopping the plug-in and restart it would the two show and working together. A few versions back, the plug-in control always came back from background with FBR as long as speak+ was activated.

title: Super
comment: Superb

I love this plugin, and would give you 5 stars except that since the last update, I can no longer exit tts by the back button from fbreader - it is now required to open the tts app separately and press stop.  This is tedious; any chance you could put it back how it used to be?
Awesome!

title: Edit speech doesn't really work
comment: When I also have @Voice installed, the edit speech doesn't really work. Only regex rules working. Please fix it and I will give five stars. BTW, standalone @Voice app works just fine. Any one look into this?

title: Crashes, but I like the ability to customize

Issues:  First, any notification, like an email, text, etc. Stops the app. Dead in its tracks. Have to restart the app to get past it.   Second, don't touch ANYTHING but the reader controls.  If you touch the book to adjust where to start the reading, poof!  App crashes. You have to restart.   Using Asus PadFone mini.

title: Really good

Is really a 10!!

title: Godsend
comment: For years I've been looking for a tts plugin and reader that "just worked"  this one does. Keeps me sane at work and entertained on hikes. One thing that would be nice is a way to edit the lexicon. Right now the main problems:     wash becomes Washington& Dr becomes drive. Update. Works but is very fussy about Bluetooth Android 5.0

Wash and Dr are problems specific to the TTS voice you are using (I guess Ivona?), other voices may say it differently. There is also a way to change pronounciation of words ("Edit speech" on Settings menu, and also other undocumented). App does not have influence over Bluetooth connection, the system is handling this exclusively.

comment: FB Reader + Ivona = excellence. Thank you so much!
Used to work flawlessly, but it now reads very very fast - nearly 1 page every second!

Maybe you have moved the speech rate slider to the right. Expand the TTS+ Plugin control panel at the bottom with the ^ button, and press "Reset TTS" button or use the "Rate" slider to set the speech rate as you need.

title: Mediocre
comment: It dosn't have the one thing that would distinguish it from other TTS engines.  It will not start on the page currently being read.   If you stop the engine and read for yourself,  there is no telling where the engine will start reading from.    I cannot fathom why this recieves 5 stars from anyone.  It lacks a basic function which anyone would expect from a decent audiobook player.

title: Ok
comment: Great

title: Now all my ebooks are audiobooks
comment: Fantastic plugin to add text to speech when using  FBReader. Good tech  support. Ability to change speed and pitch.

title: Sweet!!
comment: FBReaders' TTS widget and ability to edit speech (to eliminate distracting verbalized hyphens) makes this a big 5!! Probably now the most important app on my phone. I can lock the screen and have the app continue reading my ebooks to me while I walk, work in my relaxation garden, prepare my whole-food meals or anything else. There's no need to remain frustrated forced to put off reading only when I can use my phone unlocked--times when I'm usually working instead of reading. For decades I read a book a day (fast reader, former speed reading student during short college stint before internet addiction) but have fallen behind in my reading. This is going to make catching up on my stack of unread books now in digital form so much more productive. Thanks. A huge 5!

title: Absolutely Amazing!
comment: I use this on my Nook HD+  For some reason the TTS/TTS+ plugin would not show up on my LG Intuition, but it has worked fabulously on my Nook.  I also love the capability of changing pronunciations in the edit TTS options.  It really helps the TTS reading flow when I can select what the voice says or doesn't say.  I used to use the TTS because it read by paragraph not sentence, but when I discovered that I could change pronunciations with TTS+ I started using that one.  Best free TTS reader.  Highly recommended.  I just wish I could get this plugin to work on my LG Intuition.  Oh well!
Great app, I just wish it would pause playback when another app (like navigation) takes temporary audio focus.

title: Great app!!
comment: This + Ivona TTS = audio books quality

title: Overall great, but certain recent glitches annoying
comment: I use this app everyday and, for the most part, I love it. I have the British lady robot read me books because I find her voice more natural than the others. Recently, however, I have noticed that, all of a sudden, she cannot pronounce the word "do." No matter where it is in the sentence (though it is worse at the end of a sentence) she sounds like a robot with a dead battery as she says "da." Also some trouble with "so" but not nearly as bothersomely obvious.

title: Reads '-' aloud
comment: I really enjoyed using this. Just that it reads aloud '-' when it shouldn't. Minor inconvenience but should be addressed to enhance the reading experience.

Reading '-' aloud is a voice issue, not my app. However, you could avoid it with my speed edit function (replace '-' with nothing, or comma for a short pause). Note that there are many characters in Unicode that look like - but have different codes. Best use copy/paste to replace the correct character.

Don't know which books and which languages support you need, but if you lack the language support, you need to install it yourself. My app cannot do this for you.

title: Sleep timer.. More Setting
comment: I use this with Ivona tts voices. I love the ability to minimize or maximize the control panel. Of you're new to tts+ click on more then there click on more. You can customize the way words are pronounced. This is very helpful with names. I listened to a whole series of Jack Reacher and it pronounced it Re-at-cher. Now when it has a mispronounced word I correct it and the book is so much more enjoyable. You can also set a sleep timer.

title: This is great!
comment: I like the way I can customize the pauses after a sentence or a paragraph when having FBReader reading my notes back to me. This feature makes the voice sound more natural.  Also, a feature I've never seen before is that I can configure a setting to have the FBReader begin reading to me when I plug my earphones into the phone. Both of these features are blessings if you, like me, use FBReader's Speak feature to memorize or study.

title: Won't read anymore
comment: This is my favorite E-Reader app. I've listened to entire series of books on long road trips and when I used to deliver pizzas. Or it was until I started using it on my Nexus 5.  After reading a few paragra phs of the maze runner it just stopped working. I would press play and it would start but, would stop mid sentence or complete the paragraph then stop. I have uninstalled then reinstalled  re downloaded and the issue still occurs. Help if anyone has had this same issue.
Cannot do technical support here. With any problems, contact me by email.

title: Listening to books!
comment: High quality of voice synthesis with Google TTS, simple and functional interface
Excellent work. But sometimes plugin skips some part of text. I don't know why... Anyway 5 stars!

Please provide instructions on how to reproduce the "skip part of text" error. Contact me by email, tell which device and Android you use, and on which ebook or other file it happens, where can I download it. Also the place in the book where this happens.

title: Great plugin for a great reader!
comment: I am loving this plugin even though it is pretty buggy.  I love to be able to listen to any ebook read to me.  My biggest problem with this plugin is that it very often will not start reading on the page I am on but at the beginning of the chapter.  This makes it difficult sometimes to continue listening to a book with long chapters.  What makes this problem worse is that the fast forward and rewind buttons take a long time so getting back to where you want to be can be a real hastle.  I want to give this one more star but the bugs are holding it back.

Please contact me by email for more support. Most probably it is a problem with FBReader itself, not my plugin. I saw the author fixing something in the latest release, related to "not remembering the latest position". I would need more info from you to try to reproduce the problem and give the exact instructions to the main FBReader app author

title: Stops spontaneously
comment: Could be a great addon, but sadly reading stops spontaneously too often to be fully enjoyable. The startup also became somewhat slower than whith previous versions...
Does not work with Samsung TTS, does not support Russian
Both statements are incorrect. Works with Russian if you install Russian TTS voice, and there is no problems with Samsung voices.
Wanderful application!

title: Great app! with pitch and speed control!
comment: I am able to find a fast speech rate and comfortable pitch.  I sometimes forget I am listening to a speech engine.  I highly recommend this app.
Great app

title: Simply not working
comment: I have downloaded the FBreader as well as this app. I also have installed IVONA TTS. But every time I pressed speak+ nothing showed up. And there are not any error signs. My device is MI2S. plz fix this bug.
I have never seen such bug before. Try to uninstall and re-install IVONA, reboot the phone, things may get better.

title: Excellent!
comment: BT + lock screen controls. Best solution for walking with wired and wireless headset. No alternatives on the market.

title: As good as it gets
comment: The reader has its works, but you will not believe how his well your phone can read your book to you. Great combination with fbreader. I can read, listen in the car then read again later.

title: Excellent support and very stable
comment: Excellent support!!! The developer is very friendly and responsive. This is the only TTS plugin that I know to be the most stable one. Unlike the other TTS engine that keeps crashing on my HTC One, this one runs smoothly without a glitch when I switch the voices back and forth between the voices I purchased from Cereproc and Acapella. Highly recommended!

title: Great app for TTS! Better than Readboox
comment: Still uses the Ivona voices which are fairly good. Still it does have a couple of caveats: The in app setting for voice read spead does not work unless you access it from the Ivona settings. It has serious issues with high numbers with lots of zeroes...otherwise a very good TTS reader.

comment: The best app for eBook reading

comment: Love it - light and always working

title: Nearly there.
comment: This nifty addon to FBReader has really impressed me, it makes listening to my books a lot more pleasant and I find I can move between listening and reading or the reverse easily and fairly intuitively. Seems to work with Ivona quite well.

title: Used to work great until few days ago when it stopped....
comment: Tried to re-install but it didn't help...  Please fix asap

Please contact me by email and provide more details: which device and which version of Android, and what exactly happens when it does not work? If you see any error message on the screen, tell me its exact text. Also, re-download the latest version from Google Play and see if the error is fixed with that.

comment: thanks

title: Great App!
comment: The only improvement I have not seen mentioned and maybe it is my brand of headset, but the audio from the reader is not played through my Plantronics Bluetooth headset. It would be nice to be able to use the read aloud feature while driving.

title: Simply Perfect
comment: Love that I can have screen off at work and still use FB reader to read to me. The ability to change pitch and speed in app also are wonderful. I have no complaints. Thanks so much!
Just awesome!

title: Great app

title: Good but..
comment: It really is a good app. But it just that there no PAUSE  at the end of a sentence (at dot). It keep talk non-stop before the end of paragraph or when it meet coma (,).
Which TTS engine and voice are you using? All that I tried make a sentence pause automatically, there is no need for extra setting for that... Please reply by email (find "email the developer" link)

comment: Works well and bugs get fixed fast - at least if they are regressions!  Thanks.

title: Great and can be greater
comment: Love the unique sleep feature (reason why I switched). A few minor annoyances: remaining sleep time not displayed, going back to sleep menu shows none even when set, and always have change back voice on opening new book.

title: Works well
comment: Works great on my Nexus 7, some punctuation makes it sound a little confusing. Very good adjustments in the settings for pitch, volume and speed.

title: Word by word needs improvement
comment: I've discovered the word by word problem is androids fault, so I've given the dev 5 stars for communication and trying to fix the problem.  It would be great to be able to set that with a slider as well. Otherwise fantastic!

title: Excellent reader
comment: Especialy love the tts add in

title: TTS Heaven + Suggestion to devs
comment: Been using this for months - and have tried EVERY other TTS out there. It is the BEST. This one has the most ■ Control over Volume / Voice / Rate ---- instantly from the screen without having to go deep into Settings. ■■ Don't forget you first need FBreader for this app to work. Suggestion.... maybe devs could make quick 1 minute video showing people how to use this from the fbreader menu? Seems like a lot of their confusion could be remedied that way.
Thank you, good idea about the video, will consider this!

title: Works very well
comment: Great

title: Issues installing, cannot access app
comment: I've never had this happen with an app before, but I tried installing to my Nexus tablet, and it showed in my notifications as having been installed and the play store button says "uninstall" but it's not in my app list and not showing up on my home screens anywhere...

TTS+ Plugin for FBReader is not a stand-alone application. You need to open a book in FBReader, then press the menu button, scroll the menu up until you find "Speak +" item, press it and then you can listen to your ebook.

title: Slick little plugin, stellar support
comment: Had some initial difficulties, but these turned out to be due to poor handling of .mobi files by FBReader, and not this plugin.  Works much better with .epub files.  Developer was extremely responsive -- I've never received better support on any platform -- and was able to isolate the problem and help me find a workaround quite rapidly.

Which version of FBReader you are using, and is it a beta test version of a full release of FBReader? Please email me the exact version number, and the version of Android system you are using. What you report is not normal and there must be a simple fix to figure out. Also let me know on which ebook file this happens.

title: Excellent keep going
comment: THANKS AGAIN

title: Ok
comment: Its good but it keeps saying hifenhifen when it comes to this',--' and I says comma at this','

It's a bug of the particular TTS voice you are using. If you tell me which voice it is, and send me some sample file where this happens, I can work around the problem. Or use another voice, from another maker (e.g. Acapela instead of Ivona or whatever).

comment: Once I upgraded the  voice the program does what I wanted, no problems, works as advertise.

title: bad for the new TTS searching
comment: it takes ages for searching for TTS voices. I have 30+, Ivona,acapela,cereproc,svox,google,samsung. Why this annoying new feature.? I want the app to use my default system selected voice, as I do in every app. no complaints if it would be near instant, but waiting for more than a minute is a no no. same for @voice aloud, I uninstalled it because of this

Well, just do it once and you don't have to do this again, if you don't want to change and only use one selection (system or whatever...) The system selection is a very difficult process for not so advanced users as you. Here you can instantly see and try _all_ voices from _all_ installed engines.

title: "Đ" letter in Vietnamese text.
comment: It is very good app.The "đ" letter(lower case) always spoken right but the "Đ" letter(Upper case) sometime right sometime wrong sound.
Hello Dien, please report the issue with Vietnamese voice to the makers of this voice. My program does not control the quality of speech or how letters and words are pronounced.

title: DID NOT PERFORM
comment: Never worked. I installed app, checked different ways for performance and to no avail, app did not respond. Evaluated full cellphone even checked the widgets area. App was not found....1 STAR Uninstall.....

TTS+ Plugin is not a separate app. It is added to FBReader (free ebook reader). If you have FBReader installed, press the menu button in it, then scroll the menu down and choose "Speak+" item at the bottom. If you have an old Android version 2, after pressing the hardware menu button on your device, press "More" and then scroll down to "Speak+".

title: Class!
comment: I love this plugin. Thanks Dev!

older version of TTS Plugin I would have given 4 to 5 stars.One star because Developer did not enough beta testing on various Android devices.	Previous version of TTS Plugin worked&read EBook with synthesis Text to Speech multiple problems with Upgrade TTS Plugin by Hyperi. . . which is seperate from the FBReader App Geom ... Developer.FBReader App works correctly.The TTS Plugin Developer is where the problem lies.Upgrade TTS Plugin addon by Developer did not enough beta testing on TTS Plugin by Hyper.....  caution can really freese lock device&reboot shutdown booting in flight mode&reboot loop till uninstalling TTS Plugin&reinstall FBReader.

I have exactly same phone (SGH-I777) and test on it, TTS+ plugin works great. About 30000 people use it now and don't report any such problems. Some give me 1* rating because they don't know how to install a better TTS voice, so I'm trying to make it easier now. Nobody else complained about device locks, reboots etc.
Great

title: Fantastic!
comment: This is really great! It uses whatever TTS engine you have installed and active on your Android. I'm using it with Ivona voices and find the pronunciation really good. With the speech capability, I can read a book in the traditional way and if I need to stop reading in order to drive or exercise, I can continue to read the story by listening to it being read to me. Extremely useful!

title: Must-have.
comment: Commuting still sucks, but this tool makes it bearable.

title: Very responsive developer
comment: Thanks for the great responsiveness to me feature request! With the new networked tts support I have little remaining reason to use the Google books app for having ebooks read to me.

title: Feature request:
comment: Needs ability to resume play using headphones play button.  Currently you can only resume play by pressing play button on the headphones if it's only been paused for a few seconds. I assume this is due to the lock screen kicking in (on Galaxy s3) and preventing it working after that.

title: Great program, should not be free but is.
comment: Frequent fixes and updates.  Works exactly like an e-reader should with terrific functionality and features.

comment: I recommend it

comment: I like what it offers

comment: This is so useful with FBreader as well as the developers @Voice Aloud Reader  I use it with both russian SVOX tts and english Ivona tts.

comment: this tts reader is a great improvement on the official one from the fbreader team. several nice features and better UI.

comment: Brilliant and highly recommended if you like to listen to your ebooks on the move. The only complaint (and its small) is that when I received a call during listening, the playback didn't continue after I let the call ring out.

title: Great TTS Plugin
comment: Great TTS Plugin. Using this with FBReader gives decent performance on my not so new device. Being able to change languages is really nice too, to be able to use a mix of different voices.

title: Love this app.
comment: Great app that makes books accessible on the move. I listen at double speed now. Please add faster playback rates.

title: Good addition to FBReader
comment: Allows you to read the highlighting while the TTS plays. Gives greater control over speed and voices. A fantastic addition to a good epub reader.

title: I love it! Perfect text to speech addon.
comment: IMO this is what takes fbreader over the top. I use with ivonia tts engine, it's the next best thing to having an audiobook. I love having the choice to listen to a book when I'm driving & I'm on the middle of a book I don't want to put down. I like the extra options being right there & how you can make the player smaller so you can read along if you wanted to.

title: Simple, but powerful
comment: With this plugin it's very easy to turn your Android device into a talking book. You can choose any TTS engine you want, but mind that the quality of the input ultimately depends on the engine, not on the plugin. This doesn't just work great, but Greg, the author, was super helpful and responsive when I reported an issue to him over email.

The developer is very helpful and quick to respond to bug reports. I was surprised at the speed with which he got a new version up after I emailed a support request.  Thank you Greg for making this plugin.

title: The best got better!
comment: This FBReader, when combined with a quality TTS engine like Ivona, is the next best thing to a true audiobook. With the paragraph pause added in v1.3, even the chatttiest TTS voices are prevented from speaking in run-on sentences. Kudos to the dev! Tested on a Galaxy S1 & S3.

title: Totally awesome

title: Galaxy s2 with android 4.0.3
comment: I have been a long time user of mantano free ebook reader with Ivona as my tts engine.  When I updated android it resulted in me no longer been able to turn off my phone screen without turning off the tts engine.  This meant if I wanted to listen to a book I would be listening to it with the screen active and this would burn through my battery.  I'm so glad I upgraded and broke my old reader as Fb Reader with FBReader TTS+ Plugin gives me so much more control.  The fact I can exit and undertake other tasks such as sending email without interrupting play back of my book is a fantastic improvement and worth the switch just for this feature but you get so much more.  This would be perfect if it had a sleep timer so when I'm going to sleep I can have it turn off after a set time period.  Something similar to to Mixzing my music player.  This would be awesome it would save me loads of battery and I'd stop waking up in the middle of the night to stop the book from playing.  Give this a go, its the best solution I have found

title: Cool plugin
comment: Very impressed

comment: Gives you more control over tts. Good plugin

title: Like it
comment: Great app. Just to say that you need to have Android TextToSpeak installed as well. The "speak" mode free me up for multi-tasks.  FBReader is the best so far - no crash.

title: Great!
comment: but once I start FBReader, my stock music player stops playing. Unisntalling the plugin fixes the issue. HTC One X, stock ROM. Upd.: latest version fixes the issue!
